body.name: Speedefy High Speed Pro WiFi Router - Dual Band AC2100 Wireless Router for Streaming & Gaming, Up to 35 Devices, 2000 sq.ft Coverage, 4X4 MU-MIMO, USB Port, Parental Control (Model: K8)
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 53 mins
FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Powerful Performance: Dual-core CPU, 4x high gain antennas with 4X4 MU-MIMO technology, and Beamforming, max 2000 sq.ft WiFi coverage, support up to 35 devices. Create a stable Internet with no signal dead ends.
Pro WiFi Experience: Build high power WiFi network with Speedefy K8 WiFi router. Dual band WiFi 5 up to 2100 Mbps, no pressure on surfing Internet, gaming and streaming 4K video.
Setup in a few Clicks: With the 'Speedy WiFi' app or webpage, setup and managing the network is completely hassle-free. Setup your new router in a few clicks or taps.
Build Secure Network: There is no worry about the WiFi security with the WPA2-PSK encryption and SPI firewall. Real-time detection keeps no threats, no intrusion.

Diversified Functions: Parental control allows to easily manage your child's Internet access. Guest network keeps your visitors in separate WiFi. AP mode enables the router may also work as range extender.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better range and strong signal
reviews.reviewText: It has a better range than my earlier router that stopped working after ten months. This router was relatively easy to set up and seamless transition from my earlier one. The speeds have been fast and eliminated all issues while live streaming tv. I think the value you get for the price is great and hope that the product continues to work great in the future. I haven’t tested the LAN connection speed but have been using 2.4Ghz & 5Ghz bands connecting to multiple devices using wifi with no issues all around the home

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product !! serves the purpose !!!
reviews.reviewText: I was using an old router with which I could get max download speed of 100Mbps with LAN connection and around 80-100Mbps with wireless connection. I was looking for something better since my ISP plan is 400Mbps down and 20Mbps upload.The setup with this router was pretty easy. Just connect the modem to this router as per the instructions and you are on your way. One thing I liked about this router is that I can combine both 2.4Ghz and 5Ghz into a single band. That way I do not have to worry about remembering the names and passwords of 2 bands. I could get the speed of 400+Mbps with LAN connection and 200+Mbps with WIFI connection. The four antennas are enough to carry the signal around entire house.In short, I will recommend this product to everyone who is looking at the economical option without compromising the quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
reviews.reviewText: So far, very pleased with service, the direct plug in however drops signal and goes to wifi, wanted to have tv on a direct line so it would not pull all the bandwidth, WiFi great. Will continue to review and test

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easiest installation, worth the money!!!
reviews.reviewText: I was using the router received from internet company, and being a non-expert, I never tried, or thought of trying an after market router. I am thankful to my friend who recommended me this router. Installing this Speedefy router was so easy, I set this up through the app from my internet company, just by following the instruction.I have a setup of about 15-20 devices that includes phones, watches, voice assistant, smart lightings etc. Dual band on this device just serves all these devices perfectly. I never faced any coverage/signal strength issue so far.I would love to recommend this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Internet Keeps Dropping/Very Inconsistent
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had this product for a year and kid you not, I thought my internet provider was the issue, but after carefully checking all and having technicians come to the house, we realized it was this wifi router giving us horrible internet service. Just in the last week the internet has dropped service everyday. I dont recommend to buy, get another brand

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Hoping it works now.
reviews.reviewText: It wouldn't connect for about 10 minutes and the app would not work it took two hours to get the app to work. So far I had to restart it and reset it twice on the first day the internet was installed and it was installed in the afternoon. I called tech support and no luck, the online help was no help at all. I'll keep it for now but if this keeps happening this coming week it will be returned for a refund.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best router I've tried
reviews.reviewText: I have the Verizon FiOS gigabit connection and I tried Verizon's own router but this one is just so much better. Not only is this one a fraction of cost compared to Verizon router, it's a lot faster as well. I have many devices connected to this router and most of the time several of them are accessing internet but this router seems to be handling it very well. Totally recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast, reliable, easy to set up.
reviews.reviewText: Very pleased with the router. It gets a lot of use between remote schooling and from-home work. Email, moving large files, multiple Teams and Zoom conferences, and the occasional games all at the same time. Handles that traffic fine with no delays. Very easy to set up. Doesn't have as many detailed fine-tuning settings as some other routers, but it's got all the necessary/common ones and is working great.
